title: Round the twist Series 2 - Volume 6
creator_contributor_role: Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Four more adventures with the remarkable Twist family in their lighthouse home. 1."Yuckles" - Mr Gribble plans to build a casino on the site of a thousand year old rainforest, the home of the mysterious Yuckle - but Mr Gribble's plans blow up in his face. 2."Quivering Heap" - Young Gribble tries to prevent Pete from playing Dracula in the school play. 3."Little Black Balls" - When a goat eats Nell's valuable opal, Bronson is forced to collect and examine each of the goat's droppings. 4."Seeing the Light" - On election night, everyone gathers at the lighthouse for a party, but the lighthouse ghosts have plans of their own. Based on stories by Paul Jennings.
